testcase.name: Test Case 9
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed Then User enters product name in search input and click search button.......passed Then Verify 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' is visible in searchbox.....................passed Then Verify all the products related to search are visible..................passed
